meanings.definition: The quality or state of being jolly.
meanings.sent1: Her jollinesses brightened up the room.
meanings.sent4: The jollinesses in the air was palpable.
meanings.sent5: The jollinesses of the holiday season filled the town with joy.

meanings.definition: The act of being cheerful and full of high spirits.
meanings.sent2: We could hear their jollinesses from across the room.
meanings.sent3: The jollinesses in the office made the workday more enjoyable.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed with jollinesses through the halls.
meanings.sent5: The jollinesses of the party was infectious.
